name: d3-geo
description: Shapes and calculators for spherical coordinates.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -g d3-array:d3 -n d3 -o build/d3-geo.js -- index.js
scripts.test: tape 'test/**/*-test.js' && mkdir -p test/output && test/compare-images && eslint index.js src
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-geo.js -c negate_iife=false -m -o build/d3-geo.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-geo/build/d3-geo.js d3-geo.v1.js && cp ../d3-geo/build/d3-geo.min.js d3-geo.v1.min.js && git add d3-geo.v1.js d3-geo.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-geo ${VERSION}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-geo.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-geo.js build/d3-geo.min.js
